question: countries become more and more similar,because people are able to buy the same products anywhere in the world.do you think this is a positive or negative development?
text: In this contemporary world ,with the advancement of technology individuals can buy  items from any corner of the planet.A family can form any item around the globe and it reaches  them within 2 or 3 days.It has made the lives of society easier.This essay will discuss the positive development around the earth.

To commence with, the population are giving preference to online shopping due to which they can buy any brand easy and in a reliable manner on every side of the sphere.For instance,if a human wants to buy an electronic vacuum cleaner then an individual can place the regulation in any country all over the world.

A company make suitable efforts to deliver the form in a shorter period of era.This also helps the public to get the product without going to the market as they have to first find the item and then purchase it.The company provide customer care services after the delivery of the output .As a result ,it is the most suitable method of getting the crop while sitting at  home.

Moreover,it saves  people's day as an individual does not have second for shopping due to their hectic schedules.They are busy with their task and they mostly prefer to buy the stock from online-shopping apps.As it few seconds to form items like groceries,electronic commodities and so on.Similarity , between the ,countries help  all public on every side of the earth.To cite an example,if  somebody comes from the office at 12:00pm and needs some product  urgently then they can place a procedure in any country if in their country the brand is unavailable.As , a consequence it has  lots of merits ,and does not waste a folk pace and help a guy to do some other work while having to spend the day on shopping in the market.

In nutshell,this has lots of advantages and is helpful for  human beings and many more changes are coming into it over the years.It is directed towards the positive development of the countries and because of this countries maintain their relationship with one another.

error_list.error_des: There should be no comma after the article the in your sentence. Remove the comma.
